content: She's very playful and curious, always exploring and getting into mischief. The kids are actually doing a great job helping with her care, which is good for them to learn responsibility. I'm just having to remind them to be gentle with her and not to wake her up when she's sleeping. We're all still getting used to having a pet again, but it's been a great experience so far. Anyway, back to Emma's baby gift, do you think a personalized blanket would be something she would appreciate, or should I consider other options as well?
